channel.title: Why does the chatbox disappear during executions?
channel.description: This is one of the most tragic changes ever. How do you go out with a bang if you can't scream "NGAAAAH" while being cut down?

item.title: Why does the chatbox disappear during executions?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
But its fun. Nothing to do with balance we just like it

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the chatbox disappear during executions?

item.title: Why does the chatbox disappear during executions?
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
why? it is just spam

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the chatbox disappear during executions?

item.title: Why does the chatbox disappear during executions?
item.dc:creator: Neclord
item.description:
The issue here is that it doesn’t. The chatbox just awkwardly vanishes briefly. Being able to send unintelligible screams in the chat as you’re being slaughtered is a fun feature.

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the chatbox disappear during executions?

item.title: Why does the chatbox disappear during executions?
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
The problem is other people can talk during it, so it wasn’t much good for last words

also makes it look cooler

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the chatbox disappear during executions?

item.title: Why does the chatbox disappear during executions?
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
I agree person being executed needs to be able to talk to make good one liners.

Remember meeeeeeeee.
